casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. FAITH RANCH & FARMS FUND
v.
HERVEY 2019-0268 Supreme Court of Ohio. June 26, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MERIT DECISIONS WITHOUT OPINIONS

In Mandamus and Prohibition. On respondents' motion to dismiss. Motion granted as to the mandamus complaint and denied as to the prohibition complaint. The prohibition complaint is dismissed sua sponte because relator has an adequate remedy at law. Cause dismissed. Kennedy, Fischer, DeWine, and Stewart, JJ., concur. O'Connor, C.J., and Donnelly, J., concur in part and dissent in part and would grant a peremptory writ of prohibition. French, J., concurs in part and dissents in part and would grant an alternative writ of prohibition.
